msbt.message: It's hard to stay chill with so much on my plate, y'know?

I love !I eat it for breakfast, morning snack, brunch, late-morning snack, lunch, afternoon snack, evening snackDinner, night snack, bed snack, late- night snack, dark-time dinner, and spooky-time snacksI thought it was my favorite food But somehow I'm getting tired of it. I don't understandWhat if I start hating what I love? That's a real problem, !

It's like...how's a guy supposed to decide what to have for dessert?I s'pose would be real greatBut then I get to thinking I could really go for insteadLife is full of real tough decisions.<10_4 /> Tough—but delicious—decisions!

Folks keep asking if things are OK. I'll tell ya what's OK! Nothing! Everything in life is real un-OK!The jam I always spread on stuff?<10_4 /> Missing! It's missing, man! Missing!The jar's there like always, right? The jar never lets me down. But the jam insideit SKIPPED TOWN, man!These are dark daysrealreal dark. Tell your jam you love it while you still got the chance.
I had the weirdest dream last night.

See, last night I dreamed I had a triple-layer cake, with extra frosting, and sprinkles, all to myself!I wanted to eat the whole thing, but I woke up before I could finish!Anyway, I'm gonna get to bed early tonight so I can eat the rest!
I dreamed I was at Grandma's house. She makes that's so yum, I dream about it all the time!But last night, she made me dream pah-sketti with a side of brownies! Yummy-yum!
I dreamed about flying. It was cool. It's like I was a bird, way up high where I could see everything.But then I got hungry and couldn't figure out how to land!
Someone told me if you wish on a shooting star, your wish will come true.
Next time I see one, I'm gonna wish for .I'm talking all-you-can-eat.Yeaha pile of that never runs out! If my wish comes true, I'll share with you!
Next time I see one, I'm gonna wish to hang out with my bestest snack buddy more often!Ohbut you're right here! And you heard my wish, soooo maybe it'll come true without the shooting star!

Next time I see one? I'm gonna wish to transform into a cool giant robot version of myself.Mecha- would use for fuel, and could play all the time without stopping!Also? Since I'd be a giant? You could ride on my shoulder!
I love riding in stuff. Anytime I don't gotta walk is a good time.I never thought about it I wonder what the funnest thing is to ride?

I like riding in cars! Didja know they've got "international combobulation engines"?That means there's a buncha <10_10 /><10_5 />EXPLOSIONS<10_9 /> happening inside the engine all the time!It's real amazing. Ya just press the gas pedal down real hard and <10_10 /><10_5 />BOOM!<10_9 /> VROOOOOOM! <10_10 /><10_5 />BOOM!<10_9 /><10_7 arg="60" /> A HUH HUH HUH HUH! <10_10 />SCREEEeeeEEEeeeEEECH!<10_9 /> OUTTA MY WAY, MAAAAAAN!I'm, um I'm not allowed to drive cars. <10_4 />Anymore.

Planes are cool to ride in. Last time I was on a plane, I just chilledand watched clouds go by.But then I thought the clouds might be cotton candy, and I wanted to go eat some real bad! By the time I figured out how to open the plane door to get outside, we'd landed! Here! On this island!Anyhoo, that's why I'm not allowed on planes anymore

Boats are fun to ride! You can sing sea shamblies like "Boat boat, lookit my boat, maaaaaaan!"Oh! And ya get to yell stuff like "Fire the anchor!" and "Which side is port?!"The best boat thing is screaming "Look out! THERE'S PIRATES!"I'mnot allowed to ride on boats anymore
I looooooove drawing! I use all kindsa stuff! Colored pencils crayonsfinger paintsnack dust

I like colored pencils 'cause they smell neat! I wonder where they come from?I know colored pencils are made of treesso I've smelled a buncha trees A BUNCHA treesBut I never found a colored-pencil tree.
Finger paints are the best! It's like ya got super powers 'cause everything you touch changes color!But ya gotta remember to wash your fingers before snack time!Paint is not a snack, .

Crayons are so cool. They're little sticks of color that you rub on paper to turn the paper that color!Crayons can be trouble, though. They break real easythey melt if ya sit on 'em for too longAnd the doctor ALWAYS says "I told you not to put these in your nose!"<10_4 /> She says it every time!

The thing I'm most proud ofis my smell! I can smell like any kind of food.Check this out. I'm gonna smell like !<10_4 /> Real cool, huh? Here. I'll do another one! I dunno how I do it! I haven't had in weeks. It's a real mystery.

There's a weird rumor goin' around Some folks? They're saying none of this is real. None of it.They say the island is just a game. And everything we say? Or do? It's just to amuse somebody else!AndI dunno. I kinda maybe believe it? SO many things would make more sense, ya know?Have ya ever thought fruit grows way too fast? And ain't it weird that trees all have three kinds of wood?And have ya ever noticed there's pretty music everywhere? It's great, but it's weirdAnd does Tom Nook make ANY kind of sense to you?!"Yeah, I'll buy your seashells so you can give me back my own money to pay off a house I'm selling to you!"I meanWHAT?It's all so obvious! Our lives are fake! We all shoulda saw it a loooong time ago! A long old time agoA huh huh huh! I'm joking! It's a joke! Nobody said that! You oughta see the look on your face!I ate six bags of chips last night and fell asleep with the TV on I had real weird dreams.
Hey, guess what I've been into lately

Singing! I just go outside and start belting out at the top of my lungs!Did you know it's free?! Anyone can do it!Just be careful when you're hitting the high notes—a bug fwooped into my mouth last week and I ate it
Running around like an airplane! Feeling the wind whooshing past my face!Then getting tiredand falling into the grass and taking a nap. Whew! I need a nap just talking about it!
Munchin' on and just walking around!I used to be more into eating and parading around. This is totally different.
Do you watch lots of TV? I sure do! There's so much stuff on, I can veg out all day and never get bored!
You got news, talk shows, movies, dramas Exercise shows too, but I always change the channel on those.
And I don't mean just the shows! The commercials are just as good!
This one time, though... Gosh. This is gonna sound weird, but I swear it really happened.I fell asleep in front of the TV and woke up in the middle of the night. I'm still not real sure what I saw!
My favorite are cooking shows. I make sure to record 'em so I can watch 'em over and over and over.That way, when I forget how a recipe goesand I always forgetI can watch it again for a reminder.

Y'know what I really like, though? Hang on, I'll remember in a second Oh yeah! Quiz shows, !I like to record my favorite episodes. I always forget the answers, so I learn something every time I watch!
You KNOW I start every day by turning on the weather forecast.I usually cross my fingers for rain so I don't hafta put out my laundry.
Sometimes I close my eyes and see if I can tell what a commercial is for just by listening to it.That game's more fun when there's no voice-over. They never think to give me a spoiler warning
I know I oughta save my money, but commercials are all so cool that I wanna go buy stuff right away.
In fact, there's this one series of gum ads with a plot that's got me hooked more than any real show I watch.
Was it some kinda commercial for something? Anyway, I'm pretty sure it happened on a Saturday night.
Was I watchin' TV, or was it watchin' me? Anyway, I feel like it happened around 3:30 AM.
Maybe the TV was showing somethin' I dreamed? Hmm. I don't think it lasted more than about a minute
Did you happen to notice a REALLY good smell the other day? 'Cause I sure did! Wanna know what it was?
It was 's shampoo!It smelled sooo good! Likelike and !Amazing! Science made a shampoo that smells like Way to go, science!
It was that had.The smell was so calming and gentle, like the whole world's most delicate cheese puff. I had to have one!Uha cheese puff, I mean. Not ,
It was a great, big that was eating.The smell made me sooo hungry, so I shook some trees and got myself a whole bunch of .I don't know how many I ate, but now all my burps taste like ! It's the best!
